DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Verify effect auriculotherapy patient tension-type headache result temporomandibular dysfunction . Design : Randomized clinical study Setting : Randomized Study Participants : The study consist 38 participant randomize two group : intervention group ( n = 18 , sample loss = 1 ) placebo group ( n = 20 , sample loss = 6 ) Interventions : The intervention group receive treatment auricular acupuncture Shen Men , Kidney , Sympathetic , Subcortex , Adrenal Cerebral point . The placebo group receive auriculotherapy trachea point . Main outcome measure : visual analog scale pain pain ( VAS ) surface electromyography ( EMG ) .
DOC.brief_title: Auriculotherapy Tension-type Headache Due Temporomandibular Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: This experimental clinical trial select University , 40 student tension-type headache due temporomandibular dysfunction . Among selected subject randomize blind draw two group : intervention group ( IG ) placebo group ( GII ) . The instrument use evaluation visual analog pain scale , Survey questionnaire Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC ) 3 , surface electromyography ( EMG System Brazil ) . The EMG signal collect rest position ( 3 sample ) maximum voluntary isometric contraction ( 3 collection ) . The masseter temporalis muscle bilaterally evaluate accord protocol Rodrigues . For treatment Ear , initially clean pinna make manipulate 70 % alcohol later insert mustard seed tape follow point : Shenmen , Sympathetic , Kidney , subcortex , Adrenal Brain second Souza GI GII point trachea . Such treatment last 15 minute session , hold 2 time week , alternate ear manipulated period 5 week . For comparison group Mann-Whitney test statistic Software BioStat 4.0 software use . With significance level ( p < 0.05 ) .
DOC.criteria: Individuals tensiontype headache due temporomandibular dysfunction , age 20 30 year , sexes Individuals migraine type headache , secondary headache Use medicine 10 day per month type acupuncture treatment last 12 month
